intro: Exostema lineatum, commonly known as the silver leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant native to South America. The leaves are lance-shaped and often have a waxy texture, which helps reduce water loss in its natural habitat. This plant is often grown as an ornamental due to its unique appearance and ability to thrive in a variety of light conditions.
